name: Example Table Profile with Chat Region
comment: Chat region configuration for event parsing

chat_region.comment: Location of the chat/history box on the poker table

comment_chat_setup: To find your chat region coordinates:
1. Take a screenshot of your poker table
2. Open in image editor and measure the chat box location
4. width, height = size of the chat box
5. Make sure to capture multiple lines of chat text
6. Avoid including borders, buttons, or avatars
